entityDefn: An arrangement or agreement by which an organization, Scottrade or other,  accepts a customer's financial assets and holds them on behalf of the customer at his or her discretion. -Investopedia
Data about branch events. i.e. seminars
Market data is a general term used to represent quotation and trade data disseminated by the exchanges. This information is a hollistic view of the market.
A legal entity, which can be linked to many accounts. Internal, External, Advisor Services.
A person, or person acting as an agent of an organization, that has completed all or a portion of the online application.

entityNm: Person - Business contacts at external organizations
entityDefn: A person, that represents a business entity, with whom Scottrade maintains a business relationship.
A person, or person acting as an agent of an organization,  that has completed the application process and has funded at least one account.
Master list of securities owned in the past, present and future by Scottrade account holders.
"Activity in an account for the benefit of a customer. Activity in a G/L account to offside a client side entry."
Activity in an account for the benefit of Scottrade. i.e. daily trade settlement.
